entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , La Grande-Quatre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:42 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande IV Airport 10:55 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -17.2°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -21.0°C
Wind: SSE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening and ending overnight. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning late in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
